actions.action:
cat << 'ENDOFFILE' > train_and_predict.py
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import StratifiedKFold
from sklearn.ensemble import GradientBoostingClassifier, RandomForestClassifier, StackingClassifier
from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression
from xgboost import XGBClassifier
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler

# Load data
train_df = pd.read_csv('data/train.csv')
test_df = pd.read_csv('data/test.csv')

# Combine for feature engineering
full = pd.concat([train_df, test_df], sort=False, ignore_index=True)

# Title extraction
full['Title'] = full['Name'].str.extract(',\s*([^\.]*)\s*\.', expand=False)
# Simplify rare titles
rare_titles = ['Lady', 'Countess', 'Capt', 'Col', 'Don', 'Dr', 'Major',
               'Rev', 'Sir', 'Jonkheer', 'Dona']
full['Title'] = full['Title'].replace(rare_titles, 'Rare')
full['Title'] = full['Title'].replace({'Mlle': 'Miss', 'Ms': 'Miss', 'Mme': 'Mrs'})

# Family size
full['FamilySize'] = full['SibSp'] + full['Parch'] + 1
full['IsAlone'] = (full['FamilySize'] == 1).astype(int)

# Cabin letter
full['CabinLetter'] = full['Cabin'].fillna('Unknown').str[0]

# Ticket prefix (first non-digit chunk)
full['TicketPrefix'] = full['Ticket'].apply(lambda x: ''.join([c for c in x if not c.isdigit()]).replace('/', '').replace('.', '').strip().upper())
full['TicketPrefix'] = full['TicketPrefix'].replace('', 'NONE')

# Fill missing Embarked with mode
full['Embarked'] = full['Embarked'].fillna(full['Embarked'].mode()[0])

# Fill Fare with median by Pclass & Embarked
fare_median = full.groupby(['Pclass', 'Embarked'])['Fare'].median()
full['Fare'] = full.apply(lambda row: fare_median.loc[row['Pclass'], row['Embarked']] if pd.isna(row['Fare']) else row['Fare'], axis=1)

# Fill Age with median by Title
age_median = full.groupby('Title')['Age'].median()
full['Age'] = full.apply(lambda row: age_median.loc[row['Title']] if pd.isna(row['Age']) else row['Age'], axis=1)

# C
